Submodules

slam.frontend_manager.frontend_manager module

class slam.frontend_manager.frontend_manager.FrontendManager(config: FrontendManagerConfig)[source]

Bases: object

Manages all frontend procedures:

  • processes measurements

  • builds graph

__init__(config: FrontendManagerConfig)[source]
Parameters:

config – frontend manager configuration.

set_prior() → None[source]

Sets prior factors to the graph.

create_graph(batch: DataBatch) → None[source]

Creates main graph by merging sub-graphs (graph candidates).

Parameters:

batch – data batch with elements.

slam.frontend_manager.noise_models module

slam.frontend_manager.noise_models.get_noise_model_method(noise_model_name: str)[source]

TODO: maybe remove ?

slam.frontend_manager.noise_models.pose_isotropic_noise_model(variance: float) → Variance[source]

Isotropic Gaussian noise model for pose: [x, y, z, roll, pitch, yaw].

Parameters:

variance – float representing the standard deviation of the noise.

Returns:

gtsam noise model.

slam.frontend_manager.noise_models.pose_diagonal_noise_model(noise_variance: tuple[float, float, float, float, float, float]) → Variances[source]

Diagonal Gaussian noise model for pose: [x, y, z, roll, pitch, yaw].

Parameters:

noise_variance – tuple of 6 floats representing the variances of the noise.

Returns:

gtsam noise model.
